head.title: BUDDY'S BOYS AND THEIR $100 MILLION TOYS

hedline.hl1: BUDDY'S BOYS AND THEIR $100 MILLION TOYS

block.p: What a thoroughly delightful skewering of the Lords of Baseball ("Buddy's Boys and Their $100 Million Toys," Sept. 18). Bud Selig is everything I thought him to be, and less, in Pat Jordan's portrait. Baltimore's Peter Angelos seems to be one of the few owners to have a handle on reality. Being a "rookie" helps, I suppose. His common sense has yet to be tainted by his colleagues.
